name: Music Monsters Game for Indie Artist Facebook Pages
blurb: Doing things changes things.  Let\u2019s put the viral power of social games on artist Facebook pages and change indie music discovery.

rewards.reward: MUSIC GAMER:  $5 of game coins to buy more monsters and levels in the Facebook game;  Cheat code to unlock exclusive Kickstarter Backer Content

ARTIST SPONSOR:  $15 of game coins to buy more monsters and levels in the Facebook game,  a cheat code to unlock exclusive Kickstarter Backer Content, and a cheat code to unlock $1.99 in-app purchase of all monsters and all Music Monsters Academy locations in the mobile game on the App Store. PLUS, we'll contact you so you can designate an artist that you want to help sponsor. If ten ARTIST SPONSORS designate the same artist, we'll contact the artist to create their game for their Facebook page for the song of their choice.

ASSOCIATE MUSIC SUPERVISOR:  In addition to receiving the game coins and cheat codes of the ARTIST SPONSOR Reward, you'll get credit on the game loading screen for helping us pick the elite group of indie artists for our Facebook game. We'll contact you so you can designate an artist that you want to help sponsor. If four ASSOCIATE MUSIC SUPERVISORS designate the same artist, we'll contact the artist to create their game for their Facebook page for the song of their choice.

MUSIC SUPERVISOR:  In addition to receiving the game coins and cheat codes of the ARTIST SPONSOR Reward, you'll get credit on the game loading screen for choosing one indie artist to get their own game on their Facebook page.  We'll contact you so you can designate the artist you want to sponsor. Then, we'll contact the artist to create their game for their Facebook page for the song of their choice.

SUPER MUSIC SUPERVISOR: In addition to receiving the game coins and cheat codes of the ARTIST SPONSOR Reward, you'll get credit on the game loading screen for choosing one indie artist who can include THREE songs in their game on their Facebook. We'll contact you so you can designate the artist you want to sponsor. Then, we'll contact the artist to create their game for their Facebook page for THREE songs of their choice.

MONSTER MOGUL:  In addition to receiving the game coins and cheat codes of the ARTIST SPONSOR Reward, you get to design and name one of our four next monsters and get credit on the game Monster screen for being a Monster Mogul.

INDIE MANAGER:  You get to name and sponsor FIVE indie artists who can include THREE songs in their game on their Facebook page. We'll contact you so you can designate the artists you want to sponsor. Then, we'll contact the artists to create their game for their Facebook page for THREE songs of their choice. PLUS, we'll give you one TweetTheCheat code that you can give to the artists to unlock $1.99 of game coins for 200 of their fans each. You'll also receive the game coins and cheat codes of the ARTIST SPONSOR Reward.

INDIE LABEL: You get to name and sponsor TEN indie artists who can include THREE songs in their game on their Facebook page. We'll contact you so you can designate the artists you want to sponsor. Then, we'll contact the artists to create their game for their Facebook page for THREE songs of their choice. PLUS, we'll give you one TweetTheCheat code that you can give to the artists to unlock $1.99 of game coins for 500 of their fans. You'll also receive the game coins and cheat codes of the ARTIST SPONSOR Reward.
